section:
Credit and Acknowledgments
Many people have contributed substantially to BeanShell over the years. I will attempt to start crediting those individual here. Please do not be offended if your name is missing. This list will grow as I have time to work through my email and recover names.
Thanks to Daniel Leuck for his long time support of the project.
Me
Finally, I will put in a plug for myself: Pat Niemeyer (pat@pat.net)
If you like BeanShell check out my book:
Learning Java, O'Reilly & Associates, 2nd edition.
